H3.text: what is the best currency to take to turkey. Turkish lira

A4.text: In 2018, the lira's exchange rate deteriorated rapidly, reaching ₺4.5 per US dollar by mid-May and ₺4.9 a week later.

A5.text: The lira's value had fallen so far that one original gold lira coin could be sold for TL 154,400,000 before the 2005 revaluation.

A6.text: The Guinness Book of Records ranked the Turkish lira as the world's least valuable currency in 1995 and 1996, and again from 1999 to 2004.

A7.text: Since 2018 the Turkish lira has been in crisis, having plummeted in value following Turkish president Erdoğan's economic and political policies.

A8.text: The New Turkish lira (TRY) was introduced in 2005.

A9.text: The Central Bank of the Republic of Turkey has the sole right to issue notes.
